articles.title: Spend A Little, Get A Lot: 40 Home Upgrades That Won't Break Your Budget
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Brightech offers a shelf floor lamp with built-in USB charging ports and electrical outlets, ideal for side tables and nightstands, providing shelf space, light, and device charging. Quadrostyle, a woman-founded small business, sells removable tile decals for stairs, inspired by traditional tiles from the Mediterranean, Latin America, and Scandinavia.

articles.title: Imagination Grows Local Team Following Recent Wins
articles.author: News Team
articles.summary: Imagination agency supported Nissan with the creative and production for the global reveal of the All-New LEAF. Additionally, Imagination managed Ford's 100-year celebration, which included the global reveal of the new Ranger Super Duty. These projects represent significant product launches for both Nissan and Ford.

articles.title: Print your own Switch 2 modular accessories.
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching its new console, Switch 2. The console's details were released on June 27, 2025.

articles.title: I tried Google's new Gemini-powered clothing app – here's how you can use AI to ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google launched Doppl, a new AI-powered app. Doppl enables users to upload full-body photos and visualize how clothes would look on them.

articles.title: If You Demand Perfection But Don't Want To Work For It, These 28 Things Will Help You Achieve It
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Revlon introduced a hot air brush for creating glossy waves. RobeCurls launched heatless hair curlers for effortless waves during sleep. Fanola offers purple shampoo to transform brassy blonde hair. WD-40 launched a pen version with a precise tip. Ohora released semi-cured nail strips for professional-looking manicures at home.

articles.title: Bentley Doesn't Want Mercedes-Benz To Revive These Iconic Cabriolets
articles.author: Cole Attisha
articles.summary: The content explores a speculative revival of the Mercedes-Benz S-Class Cabriolet, potentially based on the W223 platform, with models like the S580 Cabriolet featuring a twin-turbocharged 4.0-liter V8 engine. High-performance Mercedes-AMG S63 E Performance Cabriolet and Mercedes-Maybach S680 Cabriolet variants are also envisioned. The article also discusses a comeback of Mercedes-Benz G-Class Cabriolet due to its high demand.

articles.title: GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center Officially Open  Jun. 27, 2025 21:28
articles.summary: GAC launched the upgraded AION UT, a global premium compact model, in Thailand. In addition, GAC held the grand opening of the GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center in Bangkok. This launch signifies the implementation of GAC's 'Sales + Energy Services' dual-track strategy in the region and showcases their comprehensive overseas expansion model.

articles.title: Easy DIY Pallet Bed Frame
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: A groundbreaking innovation, the Ultra-Light Tire Pump, promises to efficiently inflate even semi tires without requiring batteries, disposable parts, or bulky equipment. Its compact, pocket-sized design ensures portability and reliability for roadside emergencies and cycling adventures, offering a manual, eco-friendly, and versatile inflation solution.

articles.title: Beauty fans run to Aldi after spotting Clinique moisturiser dupe on shelves – and it's £37 cheaper
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Lacura Moisture Boost hydrating gel moisturiser, a £4.99 dupe of Clinique's Moisture Surge. The product is described as intensely moisturizing and suitable for all skin types, with a cream-gel consistency similar to the Clinique version. Customers are praising the product as a cheaper and effective alternative.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers stock up on Fairy laundry pods for 23p each
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal on Fairy Non Bio Platinum Washing Liquid Capsules, pricing 104 capsules at £23.58. Fairy Platinum Pods are dermatologically tested and known for their stain removal capabilities. Boots offers Sensitive Skin Laundry Liquid 1 Litre Bundle for £14.40, while Dunelm provides Ecover 1.5 Litre Lavender and Sandalwood Non Bio Laundry Liquid for £10.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Release Date & Older Model Support
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 at the Galaxy Unpacked event potentially on July 9, 2025. The new foldable phone is rumored to have the thinnest design and will support S Pen. Competitive pricing is also expected for the product.

articles.title: I found a giant blow-up outdoor cinema screen from Aldi for a bargain – it's great for summer movies & footie matches
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi is selling an Inflatable Movie Screen for £59.99, described as suitable for outdoor films or sporting events. Amazon has the Yoton Mini Projector on sale for £34.39, originally priced at £56.99, which is a product to go with the screen.

articles.title: Website Builder Malaysia: MYSense's All-in-One Solution
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: MYSense introduces a website builder platform designed for Malaysian businesses, featuring drag-and-drop tools and pre-designed sections. It supports building e-commerce, educational, and personal websites, along with offering web development services like WordPress and e-commerce setup to create professional websites for any business.

articles.title: 35 'Gifts' To Yourself That Are Actually Super Practical To Own
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash. NeeDoh introduced "Dream Drop" fidget toy. Londontown launched "Nail Veil" Protectant. Elizavecca launched hair treatment to restore hair health. Ninja launched new portable Crispi Air Fryer system.

articles.title: Google's new Doppl app lets you try on clothes with AI before you buy
articles.summary: Google introduced Doppl, a new experimental app from Google Labs, designed to help users visualize how outfits might look on them and explore their style. Doppl, which is available on iPhone and Android in the US, utilizes AI to create digital images and animated versions of users in clothing, building on the AI Mode tech showcased at I/O 2025.

articles.title: 11 June Beauty Launches That Have Me In A Chokehold
articles.author: Rachel Lapidos
articles.summary: Youth to the People launched a new sunscreen product, and JVN introduced a new dry shampoo. Maison Louis Marie has expanded its product line with new hair and body fragrance mists. Additionally, Lisa Eldridge launched new summer shades of her luxurious lipstick line.

articles.title: Glastonbury festival-goers to bombard mum and dad with filthy and sweaty clothes
articles.author: Mark Worgan
articles.summary: British Gas is launching "The Wash Pit," a free, solar-powered pop-up laundrette service located at Leigh Delamere Eastbound Services on June 30th. This service is designed to lighten the laundry load of festival-goers returning from events like Glastonbury.

articles.title: Roborock's Prime Day Launch: New Q & Qrevo Models Offer Smart Cleaning at Unbeatable Prices
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: Roborock is launching four new robot vacuum models: Q7 M5+, Q10 S5+, Qrevo S5V, and QV 35A. The Q7 M5+ offers mopping functionality, while the Q10 S5+ features object avoidance and a vibrating mop. The Qrevo S5V has 12,000Pa suction and warm air drying, and the QV 35A provides all-in-one cleaning under $400. These new releases will be part of Roborock's Prime Day deals.

articles.title: Save $120 Off This Roborock Q10 S5 Robot Vacuum and Never Clean Your Own Floor Again
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A new 'smart robot' vacuum cleaner has been introduced as an alternative to manual vacuum cleaners. This suggests a new product launch in the home cleaning appliance market.

articles.title: Best Bosch washing machines to upgrade your laundry
articles.author: Stuart Pritchard
articles.summary: Bosch has introduced the Series 6 WGG244ZCGB washing machine, designed for medium-sized families with a 9kg capacity. It features an EcoSilence Drive for quiet and efficient operation, 14 wash programs including specialized options like Sportswear and Stain Removal, and speed functions such as VarioSpeed and Speed Perfect to shorten cycle times. The machine also boasts an Iron Assist feature to minimize creases.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Legendary Gamecube title will soon come for the new console
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: NYXI launched the "Wizard Wireless Joy-Pad", a new GameCube-style controller for the Nintendo Switch. The controller is available in purple, with a green A button.

articles.title: New Look's light & flowy dress is a ‘flattering pick' for weddings or summer parties – & is flying off rails at 40% off
articles.author: Summer Raemason
articles.summary: New Look has launched the Pink Floral Print Puff Sleeve Lace Insert Milkmaid Midi Dress, on sale for £37.49, and the Black Puff Sleeve Midi Dress priced at £27. Sainsbury's has released a £28 butter yellow summer dress. The dresses are described with their features, pricing and availability.

articles.title: New Look's light & flowy dress is a ‘flattering pick' for weddings or summer parties – & is flying off rails at 40% off
articles.author: Summer Raemason
articles.summary: New Look has launched the Pink Floral Print Puff Sleeve Lace Insert Milkmaid Midi Dress, priced at £37.49, and the Black Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, available for £26.99 in multiple colors. The dresses are marketed for their flattering fit, versatile style, and comfortable design. Sainsbury's has also released a butter-yellow summer dress for £28.

articles.title: New Look's light & flowy dress is a ‘flattering pick' for weddings or summer parties – & is flying off rails at 40% off
articles.author: Summer Raemason
articles.summary: New Look has released the Pink Floral Print Puff Sleeve Lace Insert Milkmaid Midi Dress, on sale for £37.49, which is promoted for weddings or summer parties. Additionally, New Look is offering the Black Puff Sleeve Midi Dress for £26.99, reduced from £29.99, featuring a ruched bodice and flared skirt.

articles.title: A Decade of Recognition: Geekvape and Geek Bar Honored with Four Major Awards at Vapouround Awards 2025
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Geekvape and Geek Bar received awards for their vaping products. Geekvape won Best Tank RBA for the Geekvape Z FLI Tank, Best Brand(Asia Pacific) and the Industry Pioneer Award, while Geek Bar claimed Best Closed Pod System for its Geek Bar UP10000, which features a dual-mode system with up to 10,000 puffs.

articles.title: Google Lens: Find Makeup Looks with AI Fast
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google Lens utilizes artificial intelligence to help users discover and recreate makeup looks. Users can point their phone's camera at a picture, and Google Lens will analyze the image to find similar products, tutorials, and suggest equivalent colors. This allows users to quickly find makeup inspiration and product recommendations.

articles.title: New to The Street Announces the Broadcast of Show Number 675 This Saturday at 6:30 PM EST on Bloomberg Television Featuring: FLOKI, BioVie (NASDAQ: BIVI), Arrive AI ($ARAI), Health In Tech (NASDAQ HIT), and Commercialville T.V.
articles.author: New To The Street
articles.summary: Show Number 675 will feature Arrive AI, which utilizes AI to streamline smart deliveries. Health In Tech presents a digital health platform transforming underwriting and broker tools for next-gen insurance services. Commercialville T.V. introduces a zip‑code‑targeted, video‑based search engine for local advertising.

articles.title: Trump Mobile's phone service actually exists and it works
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched a new wireless service that functions similarly to T-Mobile, utilizing eSIM technology.  The company is also planning a late summer launch for the T1 smartphone.  The service costs $64.70 a month, and may offer a telemedicine service.

articles.title: Mid-Range Phones: 7 Key Specs & Features
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Poco launched the Poco F7 smartphone, priced starting at $399. The phone features a 6.83-inch AMOLED display, a near-flagship-level processor, up to 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage, and a large 6,500mAh battery (7,550mAh in India) with 90W fast charging. The phone includes a 50MP primary camera, an 8MP ultrawide-angle sensor, and a 20MP front camera and runs on Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0.

articles.title: 'Dessert Town' delivers a recipe for growth in N China's Shanxi
articles.summary: Shanxi Zhonghe Yixin Group launched the Global Shared Super Dessert Factory in 2024, equipped with 11 automated production lines capable of producing 3 million frozen desserts daily. The factory utilizes "frozen-to-fresh" technology to preserve the quality of desserts, which solves storage and transportation problems.

articles.title: Inbase Torque Bluetooth speaker launched in India, priced at Rs 899
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Inbase Technology has launched a new affordable Bluetooth speaker called Torque, which features 8W drivers, deep bass, and a 7-hour battery life. The speaker is available for purchase online and offline at an introductory price of Rs 899.

articles.title: Google's AI-powered Doppl app lets you try on outfits virtually
articles.author: Brittney Donovan
articles.summary: Google has launched Doppl, a new AI-powered app, that enables users to virtually try on clothes by uploading a photo or screenshot of an outfit. The app creates a digital version of the user and outfits their animated self with the selected clothing item. This builds on Google's previous virtual try-on capabilities, now allowing users to upload photos of any clothing item.

articles.title: What Strategist Readers Are Buying: Summer-Dress Edition
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Gap introduced a linen-blend ensemble, praised for its comfort and style, reminiscent of Staud. The Gap x Dôen collection also featured popular pieces. Reformation offers a wedding-guest dress option.

articles.title: Steam Summer Sale 2025 Has Started, Live Until July 10
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Valve launched the Steam Summer Sale 2025. This sale features discounted prices on various games available on the Steam platform.

articles.title: Dyson Airwrap i.d. review: After six months of use, this is what I love (and what could be better)
articles.author: Britta O'Boyle
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Airwrap i.d. in August 2024, a new version of its hair styling tool featuring Bluetooth connectivity and integration with the MyDyson app for personalized styling sequences. The Airwrap i.d. includes updated attachments and is designed to automate the curling process based on individual hair types, with models tailored for straight/wavy and curly/coily hair.

articles.title: Elysian's Phaze Dust is a proper new beer. Lemon Daydream, not quite.
articles.author: Christian D'Andrea
articles.summary: Elysian Brewing has introduced Phaze Dust Imperial Hazy IPA, an extension of their Space Dust line, featuring a crisp, tart hoppiness with citrus notes and 8.2% ABV. They have also released Lemon Daydream Lemon Blonde Ale, a lemon-infused blonde ale designed for summer, characterized by a strong lemon flavor.

articles.title: CT cannabis business launches way to deliver its product to concert venue. Here's how.
articles.author: Staff Report
articles.summary: Budr, a Connecticut-based cannabis company, has launched a new service at the Hartford HealthCare Amphitheater, enabling concertgoers to order cannabis products via their phones for on-site pickup. This new service aims to normalize cannabis use in live entertainment spaces and offer a convenient, tech-enabled experience for customers.

articles.title: Sprayed Edges Are Everywhere and I Hate Them
articles.summary: Publishers, including Barnes & Noble, are increasingly using sprayed edges on books as a marketing tactic. This trend includes exclusive editions and 'deluxe editions' with sprayed edges. Concerns have arisen regarding the quality and pricing of these editions, especially in the young adult market.

articles.title: Google releases Doppl app for AI-powered outfit try-ons
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Google has launched Doppl, an AI-powered app that allows users to virtually try on outfits using a digital avatar. The app generates AI videos to display how outfits look and move on the user's avatar. Doppl is currently available on iOS and Android in the US as an early-stage experiment under Google Labs.

articles.title: GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center Officially Open
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: GAC launched the upgraded global premium compact model, the AION UT, in Thailand, securing over 4,500 orders at the Bangkok International Motor Show.  Xiaomi launched the YU7, its first mid-size electric SUV, setting a new benchmark for intelligent mobility.

articles.title: Google's Doppl app took off my socks
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Google is testing a new app called Doppl, which utilizes AI to allow users to virtually try on clothes from various online sources. Users upload a photo of themselves and an outfit screenshot, and Doppl generates an image or video of them wearing the outfit. The app is currently available on Android and iOS.

articles.title: Lidl launches brand new bakery menu item that shoppers are going mad for
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: LIDL has launched a new bakery item called Strawberries & Cream Blondie for 89p per slice. M&S has also launched a luxury sandwich called Red Diamond Strawberry & Crème Sandwich for £2.80.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a ‘sparkly' lipstick dupe for just $6 days after a Dior gloss went viral – and it's $41 cheaper
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Walmart has launched a new collection of lip products, including the Wet n Wild Mega Glitter Liquid Lipstick, retailing for $6. This product is a dupe for the Dior Forever Liquid Transfer-Proof Lipstick. It features a transformative liquid lipstick that shifts from matte to glitter with a press of the lips, infused with Vitamin E, and boasts a fragrance and paraben-free, cruelty-free and vegan-friendly formula.

articles.title: Jersey tech scheme to offer year-round funding for ideas
articles.summary: Digital Jersey launched the Innovation Programme to fund technology projects benefiting Jersey's economy, environment, and community. The programme offers ongoing funding to entrepreneurs and businesses aiming to improve productivity, address housing needs, and respond to climate change.

articles.title: 5 Nigerian Women Share the First Perfume They Ever Bought and Why They'll Never Forget It
articles.author: Rukayat Badmus
articles.summary: MamaTega Cosmetics sells Body Fantasies Vanilla perfume for ₦3,500, and also sells Active Woman perfume for ₦6,500, and New Musk perfume for ₦5,500. TOS sells Victoria's Secret Pure Seduction Shimmer Body Mist for ₦22,610 and Dscentsation sells Kenzo Flower Eau de Parfum for ₦119,500.

articles.title: Google unveils Doppl that styles outfits virtually; offers animated videos
articles.summary: Google launched a new experimental app called Doppl in the United States. Doppl, from Google Labs, allows users to virtually try on outfits by uploading images and visualizing how outfits might look on them. The app, currently in its experimental stage, is available on iOS and Android and focuses on tops, bottoms, and dresses.

articles.title: This Shark vacuum deal is jaw-dropping at 50% off ahead of Prime Day
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: During Prime Day, Amazon is offering the Shark AI Ultra Voice Control Robot Vacuum at 50% off. The vacuum features 360-degree LiDAR mapping, smart precision grid scrubbing, self-emptying functionality for up to 60 days, voice control, and a self-cleaning brushroll. The product also can be accessed via an app.

articles.title: Google launches Doppl app for AI-powered virtual outfit try-ons
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google Labs has launched Doppl, an experimental app designed to enhance the online shopping experience through AI-based virtual outfit try-ons. Currently available in the US, Doppl allows users to visualize how clothes look on them by merging user photos or AI models with clothing images. The app also supports features like video animation, easy sharing, and smart completions.

articles.title: Would You Boogie With This Chevy Van?
articles.summary: A customized Chevy G10 van features significant modifications, including a shag-carpeted interior, a sink, sleeping quarters, LED lighting, and a sliding door on struts. The van is powered by a 350ci V8 engine with an Edelbrock Performer chrome intake manifold and TH350 transmission. These changes represent a substantial update and re-imagining of the original vehicle.

articles.title: New Edinburgh Scotmid supermarket to open offering 'exciting food-to-go range'
articles.author: Cara Blackhall
articles.summary: Scotmid is launching a new supermarket in Fountainbridge in mid-July. The new store will create 26 jobs, support local suppliers like Saltire Patisserie and offer a new food-to-go range with Japanese-inspired options and fresh food selections.

articles.title: Popular £1.15 crisps RETURN to UK supermarket's shelves with two new flavours – and they're perfect for a weekend BBQ
articles.author: Alex Lancaster-Lennox
articles.summary: Aldi has relaunched its 'Taste of America' range, introducing new products including 'Specially Selected Hot Dog & Onion Crisps' priced at £1.15. The range also features Aldi-exclusive 'Takis Teriyaki', which launched on June 12th, expanding Aldi's selection of American-inspired snacks and treats.

articles.title: If You Love A Clean House But Also Identify As Lazy, Here Are 32 Products That Do The Work For You
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article features a variety of newly introduced cleaning products and tools available for purchase.  Products such as Bissell multipurpose portable cleaner, Swiffer PowerMop, Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator, and Everneat natural oven scrub are highlighted, each offering innovative features for efficient home cleaning.

articles.title: I ditched my phone for this E Ink handset for two weeks - here's my buying advice now
articles.author: Matthew Miller
articles.summary: Mudita has launched the Kompakt minimalist phone, available now for $439. The phone features an E Ink display and prioritizes simplified connectivity with phone calls and text messages. It has a 4.3-inch display with touch-sensitive buttons and a fingerprint sensor.

articles.title: ZIPS Cleaners returns to Lancaster with new location
articles.author: Ed Gruver
articles.summary: ZIPS Cleaners has opened a new location in Lancaster, offering dry cleaning, washing, pressing, laundering, and tailoring services. The new location offers in-by-9-out-by-5 dry cleaning for $3.49, delivery via DoorDash, and 24/7 EZ Drop access.

articles.title: The best Fourth of July mattress sales: Save up to 35% on Saatva, DearFoam, Helix and more
articles.author: Nora Colomer
articles.summary: Nectar is offering its flagship memory foam mattress with a 365-night sleep trial. Saatva's Contour5 Mattress features a pressure-relieving design and a one-year trial. Dreamfoam Hybrid by Brooklyn Bedding is offering 30% off for Fox News readers with code FOX30, along with a 120-night comfort trial. Helix Midnight provides zoned support and is available with 27% off using code FOX27, plus a 100-night trial.

articles.title: What Is Freshconvos? Is Freshconvos Real? A Complete 2025 Review
articles.summary: Freshconvos is introduced as a new online communication platform designed for meaningful conversations. The service connects individuals from around the world, offering features like personalized newsfeeds, various interaction tools, and media sharing options. Creating an account on Freshconvos website is free to use, with paid features that offer enhanced functionality.

articles.title: బీఎస్ఎన్ఎల్ నుంచి అదిరిపోయే ఫ్లాష్ సేల్.. పెద్ద ఆఫర్లు రాబోతున్నాయ్.. ఫ్రీ డేటా, డిస్కౌంట్స్..?
articles.summary: BSNL is teasing a flash sale for Indian consumers. The specific details of the sale and related services are not provided, but the announcement suggests potential new offerings or promotions from BSNL.

articles.title: Blanco Niño takes on Holy Moly, launching its own guacamole
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Blanco Niño is launching a new high-pressure processed guacamole (200g) with a higher avocado percentage (92%) than Holy Moly's Original Guacamole. The product will be exclusively available at Ocado starting June 30th and aims to offer a complete Mexican snacking experience.

articles.title: 32 Things To Make Your Life Seem Put-Together On The *Surface*
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new cleaning and household products designed for convenience and efficiency. These include products like a no-scrub shower cleaner, facial cleaning wipes by Olay, I Dew Care's dry shampoo powder, John Frieda's Secret Weapon Touch Up Creme, iRobot Roomba, a grout ink pen, and the ChomChom pet hair remover. The products aim to simplify cleaning routines and address specific needs such as removing pet hair, managing wrinkles, or quickly tidying up a home.

articles.title: Early Prime Day deals: Top 20 Amazon finds under $100
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Amazon is promoting various products during its upcoming Prime Day event. Some of the products with discounted prices include the Insignia 32-inch Fire TV, Amazon Fire HD 10 tablet, Apple AirTag 4 Pack, Logitech for Creators Blue Yeti Nano USB Microphone, Keurig K-Express Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, and Eureka PowerSpeed Vacuum Cleaner for Pets. These products span across categories such as electronics, home goods, and appliances.

articles.title: Early Prime Day deals: Top 20 Amazon finds under $100
articles.author: Trisha Easto
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early deals ahead of Prime Day, featuring discounts on various products. These include items like the Insignia Fire TV, Amazon Fire HD 10 tablet, CHEFMAN Multifunctional Digital Air Fryer, Logitech Blue Yeti Nano USB Microphone, Apple AirTag 4 Pack, and Keurig K-Express Coffee Maker, among others. Amazon Prime Day 2025 will take place from July 8th to July 11th.

articles.title: BSNL Launches SIM Card Home Delivery Service: Follow Simple Steps To Apply Online
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: BSNL has launched a new doorstep SIM card delivery service to simplify getting a new mobile connection. Users can request a new SIM, prepaid or postpaid, via BSNL's dedicated SIM delivery portal by providing basic details and completing a self-KYC process. This initiative aims to attract new customers and retain existing ones, especially in rural areas.

articles.title: Yocan Launches iShred Grinder: Revolutionising Herb Preparation with Visible Grinding Tech
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Yocan introduces the iShred Smart Grinder, a new vaporization technology device. The iShred features a dual-mode smart grinding system, a see-through grinding window, and an all-in-one portable design with a 450mAh battery and dual-function glass chamber.

articles.title: Mahindra Set To Unveil New ‘NU' Platform This Independence Day
articles.author: Samreen Pall
articles.summary: Mahindra is set to unveil its new vehicle platform, NU (formerly NFA), on August 15, 2025. The NU platform will support ICE, hybrid, and fully electric powertrains and will be built at Mahindra's Chakan plant. Industry insiders speculate that the next-generation Bolero or Thar Sports might be launched on this platform.

articles.title: Orange Sky Golden Harvest exits HK cinema market after 5 decades
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: Hennessy launched Asia's first Hennessy Mart in Central Market. Hennessy Mart features revolutionary tap cocktails.

articles.title: Orange Sky Golden Harvest exits HK cinema market
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: Hennessy launched Asia's first Hennessy Mart in Central Market. The new Mart features revolutionary tap cocktails, introducing a novel offering from the company.

articles.title: Yocan Launches iShred Grinder: Revolutionising Herb Preparation with Visible Grinding Tech
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Yocan introduces the iShred Smart Grinder, a device designed to improve herb preparation. The grinder features a see-through grinding system and intelligent protection features.

articles.title: 'Women Are Winning': South African Woman Inspires Mzansi With Her Car Purchase Journey
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: A young South African woman showcased her brand-new black Kia Sonet, a compact SUV with modern features and fuel efficiency. The Kia Sonet includes touchscreen infotainment, reverse camera, multiple airbags, and ample boot space, starting from around R313,000.

articles.title: Best Dyson deals for June 2025
articles.author: Lars Stannard
articles.summary: Dyson is offering deals on several of its products during its Summer Event. Noteworthy mentions include the Dyson Supersonic Nural hair dryer with built-in sensors for automatic temperature adjustment, the Dyson Airwrap Origin multi-styler with limited attachments at a discounted price, and the Dyson Cyclone V10 Absolute cordless vacuum cleaner featuring a longer runtime and redesigned dust capacity.

articles.title: Lava Storm Lite Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Lava officially announced the Lava Storm Lite smartphone on June 13, 2025, and released it on June 19, 2025. This 5G-ready phone features a 50-megapixel camera, a 6.75-inch display, and is powered by a Mediatek Dimensity 6400 processor with options for 64GB or 128GB internal storage.

articles.title: DO NOT DRINK: Illustrated reviews of potions that probably ruined time itself
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Dreamina introduces its AI image generator, logo generator, and sticker maker services to help users create visuals for personalized spell potions. These tools allow users to design logos, stickers, and images with effects, textures, and colors, enhancing the branding and marketing of potion-related content. The service enables users to create a visual narrative around their potions, making them more intriguing and engaging.

articles.title: Google announced on the 26th (local time) that it will launch a new app Doppl that allows users to t..
articles.author: Lee Young-Wook
articles.summary: Google launched a new AI virtual dressing app called 'Dopple' available on iOS and Android in the United States. The app allows users to virtually try on clothes using AI by uploading photos and costume images. It creates a picture of the user's digital avatar wearing the outfit and can generate AI-based videos for a realistic view.

articles.title: Google Doppl AI dresser changer app launched: Here's how to change clothes in photos
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google has launched Doppl, a new app available on Android and iOS in the U.S., that lets users virtually try on clothes by using AI to generate an animated video of the outfit on a user's virtual version. Doppl builds on Google Shopping's earlier try-on feature and allows users to test tops, bottoms, and dresses, save their favorite looks, and upload images of clothes from social media or local stores.

articles.title: Samsung launches affordable Galaxy Buds Core earphones in India, here is everything you need to know
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Buds Core, a new budget-friendly wireless earphone in India. Available from June 27th, the Galaxy Buds Core feature Active Noise Cancellation, Ambient Sound, Galaxy AI's Interpreter feature, and up to 35 hours of battery life with the charging case. It is priced at Rs 4,999 and available in Black and White colors.

articles.title: Limerick man appointed Director of Innovation at UCD
articles.author: Sarah Coleman
org: Research Ireland Centre for AI-Driven Digital Content Technology
articles.summary: Under Liam Cronin's leadership, RDI Hub supported 100 start-ups which have launched 70 new products and services. Liam Cronin has been appointed as Director of Innovation at University College Dublin (UCD).

articles.title: This pouch could be the Zyn of caffeine
articles.author: Grace Snelling
articles.summary: Wip, a new caffeine pouch brand, has launched with 100-milligram and 200-milligram strengths in candy-like flavors. Wip is positioned as a convenient and cost-effective alternative to traditional caffeine sources, targeting athletes and consumers seeking a quick energy boost and is available online, on Amazon, at convenience stores in Florida and Arizona, and at some smaller athletic stores across the country. The brand aims to establish a new category for energy and caffeine consumption.

articles.title: Costco Is Selling a New Treat Based on a Popular Product. Customers Are Raving
articles.author: Anne Bucher
articles.summary: Costco has launched new mini cupcakes, available in chocolate and vanilla with buttercream frosting. These cupcakes are similar to the chain's sheet cake, but in a smaller size, and are being sold in 12-packs for $8.99. Customer response to the new bakery item has been enthusiastic.

articles.title: Primark shoppers 'obsessed' with 'stunning' £28 maxi dress
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark launched its new 'Floral Bandeau Maxi Dress,' priced at £28 and available in sizes XXS to XL. The dress features a strapless neckline, a cream base with a floral print, and is available for purchase in-store or via Click and Collect.

articles.title: Primark 'slaying' with 'stunning' and 'gorgeous' £28 maxi dress
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new Floral Bandeau Maxi Dress, priced at £28 and available in sizes XXS to XL. The dress features a cream base with a floral print in blue, purple, and green, designed with a strapless neckline and a relaxed silhouette. Customers can purchase it in-store or via Click and Collect.

articles.title: Xiaomi's YU7 Electric SUV Launched In China: Here's What It Offers
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched its first electric SUV, the YU7, in China. It is available in three variants ranging from RMB 199,500 to RMB 289,900, offering ranges of 835 km (rear-wheel drive) and 770 km (all-wheel drive). The top-tier Max variant boasts 690 hp and can accelerate from 0 to 100 km/h in just 3.23 seconds.

articles.title: Google's AI-powered Doppl app lets you virtually try on clothes: Here's how to use
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Google has launched a new experimental app called 'Doppl' through Google Labs. This app allows users to virtually try on clothes by uploading photos of outfits and a full-body picture. Doppl uses AI to create a digital, animated version of the user to show them how the outfit would look, and also offers an AI-generated video overview.

articles.title: NTT Unveils Revolutionary IOWN Tech at Osaka Expo
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: NTT showcased its IOWN technology at the Osaka Kansai Expo, featuring high-speed connectivity, enormous capacity, and remarkable energy efficiency. The technology includes AI-driven processing that allows for remote manipulation of audience members' appearances, demonstrating a novel approach to digital interaction. NTT aims for energy consumption at just 1% of current standards and envisions progression beyond current digital confines.

articles.title: Primark's 'gorgeous' £28 summer maxi dress looks 'stunning on'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark is launching its Floral Bandeau Maxi Dress, priced at £28 and available in sizes XXS to XL. The dress features a strapless neckline, floral print, and is designed for both casual and evening wear. Shoppers can check stock levels or order via Click and Collect.

articles.title: Google's new 'Doppl' app helps you virtually try on outfits
articles.summary: Google launched Doppl, an experimental app using AI to visualize outfits on users. The app, available on iOS and Android in the US, allows users to upload photos and try on different outfits virtually, creating stylized images and AI-generated videos of themselves wearing the clothes.

articles.title: Elevate Your Rankings with Top SEO Services in Los Angeles
articles.summary: Innovate Marketers offers premium SEO services in Los Angeles designed to improve business visibility and attract traffic. Their services include on-page SEO, technical audits, content marketing, and link building, promising enhanced online presence and growth for businesses of all sizes.

articles.title: I found a half price alternative to the Laneige bouncy and firm sleeping mask
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: No7 has released its good intent bouncy jelly mask, priced at £14.95, promising to soften, moisturize, and give a dewy finish. This product is being compared to Laneige's bouncy and firm mask (£32), which launched in March 2024, with both sharing similarities in branding and formula. A reviewer tested both products to assess their effectiveness and compare their impacts on the skin.

articles.title: Meghan Markle sends Prince Harry a 'secret message' with latest move
articles.author: Sophia Papamavroudi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's rosé wine from 'As Ever' is launching with 'soft notes of stone fruit, gentle minerality an a lasting finish'. The product is described as a bespoke blend launching just in time for summer.

articles.title: Harvey Norman opens new store at Lot One mall with special deals
articles.author: Charis Gan
articles.summary: Harvey Norman has opened a new store at Lot One in Choa Chu Kang, offering a range of home appliances and IT products. Exclusive opening deals are available, including discounts on Monster True Wireless Earbuds, Dyson Supersonic hair dryers, and Sharp Front Load Washers.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney scoops up new collab after bathwater soap backlash
articles.author: TN Web Desk
articles.summary: Baskin-Robbins is launching two new limited-time ice cream products, Sydney's Signature Scoop and Sydney's Signature Fizz, as part of the "Sweet on Sydney" menu, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney. These new treats will be available nationwide starting July 1.

articles.title: ⚡Xiaomi YU7 Launched With 835 km of Range; Check Price and Specs of EV SUV
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the YU7, a high-performance luxury SUV, in China. The YU7 is available in Standard, Pro, and Max versions, offering up to 835 km range and is powered by HyperEngine V6s Plus. The launch resulted in 289,000 orders within the first hour.

articles.title: Costco Shopper Found A Great Deal On A Dryer That Came With Removal, Delivery, Installation And A 2-Year Warranty
articles.author: Matthew Gilligan
articles.summary: Costco is offering a dryer for $530 which includes delivery, installation, and all necessary parts. This service also includes a two-year warranty and removal of the old dryer. The dryer was delivered and installed within the same week of purchase.

articles.title: NEWZO 2.0: Revolutionizing News Sharing and Earning
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Grow India Martech Pvt. Ltd. launched NEWZO 2.0, an upgraded news-sharing app featuring a 5-tier user classification system and enhanced functionalities. The updated app provides increased rewards, a faster interface, seamless categorization, and collaboration with NDTV, targeting diverse user groups with news consumption and monetization opportunities.

articles.title: Wrexham: Nouveau Restaurant to become 'more family-friendly'
articles.author: Megan Haf Donoher
articles.summary: Nouveau is launching a brand new menu and style of service, transitioning to a family-friendly street-food concept featuring tacos and burgers. This decision follows customer feedback and aims to attract families visiting the nearby cinema and bowling alley. The restaurant will also become more fast-paced with the installation of a new meat smoker machine.

articles.title: Tineco Launches Prime Day Offers: Make This Summer Chore-Free
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco is offering exclusive discounts on its best-selling products, including the FLOOR ONE S7 Stretch Ultra, FLOOR ONE STRETCH S6, PURE ONE S9 Artist, PURE ONE STATION 5 Plus, and CARPET ONE Cruiser. These offers are available on Tineco's Amazon Store from June 28 to July 11, 2025, with an additional discount using a promo code.

articles.title: VOOPOO Wins Two Prestigious Vapouround Awards at the World Vape Show Dubai 2025
articles.author: Shenzhen VOOPOO Technology co.
articles.summary: VOOPOO showcased its latest technologies and products at the World Vape Show Dubai 2025, including the ARGUS Matrix and VMATE Pro 2. The ARGUS series features the new ARGUS Top Fill Cartridge V2, powered by the revolutionary iCOSM 2.0 technology.

articles.title: Spotted a cool outfit in-store or on social? Google's Doppl app will let you try it on virtually
articles.summary: Google has launched an experimental AI-powered virtual fitting room app called Doppl. This app allows users to upload a full-body photo and then visualize how different clothes might look on their own body, using images or screenshots of clothing. Currently available on iOS and Android in the United States, Doppl represents Google's effort to make fashion exploration more interactive.

articles.title: Top 5 washing machine for monsoon season: Check out the best options on Amazon from well-known brands
articles.author: Nivedita Mishra
articles.summary: Bosch, IFB, and LG offer washing machines designed for monsoon season. The Bosch WGA252ZSIN features Anti Stain and AI Active Water Plus. The IFB Executive SXN 9014K has AI-powered wash cycles and a 1400 RPM spin speed. The LG FHD0905SWM integrates washer-dryer functionality with AI Direct Drive Technology.

articles.title: It spins, it's frozen, it's fun. Everything else can wait for winter
articles.summary: Strauss Ice Cream introduced 'Twister,' a new product that has been tasted. Opinions about the taste of the product are being shared.

articles.title: Top 5 Concealers for Flawless Coverage and Easy Blending
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris introduces a full coverage concealer designed for a flawless satin-matte finish. Forever52 offers an Easily Blendable Concealer for high coverage. INSIGHT presents the Liquid HD Satin Concealer, providing a soft, skin-like finish ideal for dry to combination skin.

articles.title: Google unveils Doppl, a new app that lets you try new clothes digitally
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google launched a new app called Doppl on June 26, allowing users to virtually try on clothes. The app utilizes AI to generate visuals and allows users to see how outfits look on them, including generating entire outfits from a single piece of clothing. Doppl is currently available in the United States on Android and iOS.

articles.title: GTA VI Listed on Xbox Store Before Release
articles.author: Varun Keval
articles.summary: Grand Theft Auto VI (GTA VI) will be released next year and is now listed on the Xbox Store for Xbox Series X and S. Users can add GTA VI to their wishlist to receive notifications about its availability for purchase or pre-order.

articles.title: Popular Japanese food chain Yoshinoya to offer noodle bowl in Japan to attract more female customers
articles.author: The Japan News
articles.summary: Yoshinoya Co. is launching its first-ever noodle dish, gyutama stamina mazesoba, on July 4th for the summer season. The dish features Chinese noodles, stewed beef, egg, and other toppings. Yoshinoya aims to attract a broader customer base, including women and families, and plans to offer the dish at approximately 1,250 restaurants nationwide until around August, with a goal of selling 2 million servings.

articles.title: Intellect Design launches world's first AI platform for bankers in GIFT City
articles.author: News India
articles.summary: Intellect Design Arena Ltd launched PF Cloud, an Open Business Impact AI Platform named Purple Fabric, at GIFT City. This AI platform aims to provide enterprise transformation capabilities, enabling institutions to build intelligence into their operations while remaining compliant and secure.

articles.title: New Look's £10 summer dress is perfect for heatwaves and 'hiding bloated tummies'
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Grey Smock Mini Dress for a sale price of £9.59, reduced from £15.99. The dress is available in three colors and sizes 6-22, made from breathable cotton, and features an elasticated waist.

articles.title: Sleep Deep with Premium Queen Size Mattress Deals in Singapore
articles.summary: The Mattress Boutique introduces its queen size mattress collection in Singapore, designed for superior comfort, back support, and durability. The collection includes memory foam, pocket spring, and latex options. Customers can expect free delivery and expert advice.

articles.title: Xiaomi SUV Takes Aim at Tesla
articles.author: Tracy Qu
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the YU7 sport-utility vehicle, a new car poised to potentially challenge Tesla's Model Y. The unveiling occurred at an event on Thursday, marking Xiaomi's expansion into electric vehicles.

articles.title: Hertz Is Using AI to Scan Your Rental Car for Damage, and It Might Cost You
articles.author: Cenk Demircan
articles.summary: Hertz is introducing AI-powered scanners to inspect rental cars for damage before and after customer use. This new system automatically detects even minor scratches and scuffs, generating bills for customers without human intervention. This technology represents a new method for Hertz to manage and monetize potential damage to their rental fleet.

articles.title: BizHawk: State-of-the-Art Car Wash Opens at Fuel Depot in Goleta
articles.author: Joshua Molina
articles.summary: Entrepreneur John Price reopened a state-of-the-art car wash at Fuel Depot, featuring advanced cleaning technology and vacuuming stations. Manifattura, a new Italian restaurant, is opening soon in Santa Barbara. Additionally, Neez Goodz, a store selling pop culture merchandise, has opened in Paseo Nuevo, and Gracie Waterfront restaurant will open in Santa Barbara Harbor, while vintage clothing shop Loveworn opened a new location in Carpinteria.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 Lite to launch in India on 8 July: Expected price, specs and more
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the Nord CE 5, anticipated to feature a 6.77-inch OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, and a dual camera setup with a 50MP primary shooter. The phone is expected to pack a 7,100 mAh battery with 80W fast charging and could be priced around ₹ 25,000.

articles.title: Trump Mobile drops ‘Made in USA' smartphone claims from website
articles.summary: Trump Mobile introduced its first mobile handset, the T1 Phone, priced at US$499. The company's website initially promised the phone would be made in the USA, but this language has been removed, now stating it's 'designed with American values'. Trump Mobile also offers a monthly phone service called the 47 Plan for US$47.45.

articles.title: Shiseido giving away free £90 'miracle' anti-ageing serum with 'visible results' in 2 days
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Shiseido is offering free samples of its new and improved Ultimune Serum, which is clinically proven to slow down seven signs of aging. The serum is fortified with Japanese biotechnology and promises to improve skin elasticity, radiance, and firmness, with a study showing 95% of participants seeing more youthful skin in one week.

articles.title: New & Noteworthy: The 10 Buzziest Beauty Products To Launch This Year (So Far)
articles.author: Ashleigh Cometti
articles.summary: Several companies have recently launched new beauty products. Bioderma released a limited-edition Victoria Beckham Sensibio H20 Micellar Water. Aesop introduced its first chemical exfoliant, the Lucent Facial Refiner. Osmosis launched StemFactor Growth Factor Serum and Murad released Heartleaf Calming Cream.

articles.title: Trump Mobile drops ‘made in USA' smartphone claims from website
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched a new cellular service and plans to release the T1 Phone. Originally advertised as 'made in the USA', the company has removed this claim from the website, now stating the phone is 'designed with American values in mind'. Hardware specifications have also been adjusted, with the screen size changing from 6.78 inches to 6.25 inches.

articles.title: The Hyundai Elantra N gets a new six-speed manual gearbox with a P2.638-M price tag
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor Philippines has launched a manual transmission variant of the Elantra N sedan. The manual Elantra N retains the 2.0-liter turbocharged four-cylinder gasoline engine, producing 276hp and 392Nm of torque, but is now paired with a six-speed manual gearbox featuring rev-matching. The manual variant is priced at P2.638 million.

articles.title: This AI-powered startup studio plans to launch 100,000 companies a year — really
articles.author: Connie Loizos
articles.summary: Audos, a new venture by Henrik Werdelin, has launched an AI-powered platform to help aspiring entrepreneurs build businesses. The platform offers AI tools, funding up to $25,000, and assistance with distribution via social media, in exchange for a 15% revenue share. Since its beta launch, Audos has already helped launch 'low hundreds' of businesses.

articles.title: This AI-powered startup studio plans to launch 100,000 companies a year — really
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Audos, a new venture by Henrik Werdelin, aims to democratize entrepreneurship by providing AI tools to help individuals build sophisticated AI products and find niche customers using social media algorithms. This new AI-powered service will help 'everyday entrepreneurs create million dollar AI companies' without requiring technical skills.

articles.title: Android 16 Desktop Mode: Phones Reimagined
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Android 16 introduces enhancements like desktop mode, HDR brightness adjustments, and lock screen customizations. Samsung's One UI 8, built on Android 16, brings its own features, while automakers are integrating the new OS to enhance in-car infotainment systems. Google's Pixel phones often receive Android updates first.

articles.title: POCO launches F7 with new chip, cooling, and camera features
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: POCO has introduced the POCO F7 smartphone, powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 Mobile Platform, boasting improved speed, cooling, and battery life. The device features a 6500mAh battery with 90W HyperCharge and includes a 50MP Sony sensor camera system. POCO also unveiled Rydr, its first virtual avatar.

articles.title: Lovehoney battles tough ad restrictions in unapologetic, raunchy new campaign
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Lovehoney launched a new creative platform, 'Feel the Lovehoney', in partnership with Leith. The platform aims to promote sexual happiness through humor and innuendo, addressing advertising restrictions. The 360° campaign is being rolled out across TV, digital, and social channels.

articles.title: Here's your first glimpse of the all-new MG ZS Hybrid+ ahead of its July 3 launch
articles.summary: MG is launching the next-generation ZS on July 3, featuring fresh looks, updated technology, and a new hybrid powertrain option. The ZS boasts more aggressive styling and an overhauled interior, with three variants available, all featuring 1.5-liter four-cylinder gasoline engines, including a top-spec hybrid.

articles.title: Shenzhen: Keeping Pace with the AI Revolution
articles.summary: Shenzhen Baibaohui Gold Jewelry Co. implemented AI-assisted jewelry design, leading to an 80% reduction in design times. The company also saw a 35% increase in customer satisfaction due to AI image recognition and real-time 3D rendering, which halved decision-making time and boosted the concept-to-product conversion rate by 28%.

articles.title: Legacy companies with rich data are transformed by AI
articles.author: Alberto Prado
articles.summary: Unilever is using AI to enhance its research and development, leveraging a century of scientific data to personalize product formulations and accelerate the discovery of new materials. This integrated process enables them to respond more quickly and precisely to consumer needs, moving from research to product refinement more efficiently. The AI implementation focuses on augmenting human creativity and empathy, allowing scientists to focus on design and experimentation of products.

articles.title: Why Persona 5: The Phantom X Surpassing Royal's Peak Player Count is Only the First Hurdle
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Persona 5: The Phantom X, after regional testing, has launched internationally on PC and mobile platforms. It is a live-service gacha game.

articles.title: TotalEnergies Corbion releases new Luminy� PLA life cycle assessment
articles.author: Hydrocarbon Engineering
articles.summary: TotalEnergies Corbion has launched Luminy, a new product.

articles.title: Innovative 5-second dishwasher unveiled in Dongguan's Songshan Lake
articles.author: Clarice
articles.summary: 2nd-Curv. Co., Ltd. has launched the "5 sec high-speed dishwasher," a new appliance with a 5-second washing capability. The dishwasher uses a high-pressure, low-noise water pump and high-temperature water to clean dishes efficiently while minimizing water and energy consumption.

articles.title: Panera Bread Is Saying Ciao With Three New Italian-Inspired Menu Items
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Panera Bread has introduced new menu items.

articles.title: 'I tried M&S brand new 'picky bits' range' and one item is a real game changer
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer's launched a brand new range of 'picky bits'. Niamh Kirk tried the new range to assess their worth.

articles.title: Johnnie Walker Takes the Spotlight at Island BlockParty
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker launched its newest variant, Johnnie Walker Blonde, in Nigeria on June 14th at the Island BlockParty. This lighter, subtly sweet Scotch whisky aims to appeal to a new generation.

articles.title: Walmart opens new stores – but not to the public. Here's why.
articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: Walmart is expanding its drone delivery service around Tampa Bay to include groceries, over-the-counter medications, and meals. The company is also testing "dark stores" to improve customer service by exploring new features and capabilities for shopping.

articles.title: Brooklyn Beckham On Why He Likes His Cocktail Spicy
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Jefferson's has partnered with a cooking influencer and hot sauce founder to launch its new rye whiskey.

articles.title: Seize the opportunity, go beyond what your physical body can do for you June 27, 2025 11:41 AM Subscribe
articles.summary: A company introduces 'The Box,' a full-size wearable designed for women. This device combines generative AI with LCD technology to replace the user's physical self with a versatile avatar for various activities.

articles.title: Google's Doppl app is the future of fashion try-ons—here's how it works
articles.author: Suchismita Maity
articles.summary: Google launched Doppl, a new experimental AI-powered app for iOS and Android in the U.S., that allows users to virtually try on outfits by creating a digital version of themselves. The app enables users to upload photos of outfits and generate images or AI-generated videos of their virtual self wearing the selected clothing, enabling them to save and share their favorite looks.
